visualization_prompt: Generate a bar chart showing organic agricultural area comparison between 2012 and 2018 using pattern-filled categorical columns with value annotations

title.text: Total Organic Agricultural Area by Country (2012 vs 2018)

subtitle.text: Source: Synthetic data simulating Eurostat patterns

visualization_explanation: The dataset contains 2-dimensional categorical-temporal data comparing organic agricultural areas across 10 EU countries. Synthetic data was generated maintaining Eurostat's published statistical relationships: 2012 values follow μ=489.5kha, σ=270.3kha, while 2018 data shows 15.2% average growth (μ=563.7kha, σ=322.1kha) preserving original country rankings. The clustered bar chart maximizes data-ink ratio through direct value labels and pattern differentiation, following Tufte's principles. Vertical orientation accommodates long country labels while maintaining Cairo's position-as-length accuracy. Color patterns (light=2012, dark=2018) create perceptual grouping without chromatic bias. Y-axis tick interval optimization (200kha) maintains proportional interpretation while data labels provide exact values.
